description:
Miroku and Sango see a mysterious lump of flesh in the depths of Mt. Hakurei.Sesshomaru and Kikyo sens the strange happening from different locations, and make heir way to Mt. Hakurei.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Banryu, la invencible arma de Bankotsu
Die Macht von Banryuu! Ein Kampf auf Leben und Tod!
Poderosa Banryuu!; O combate mortal dentro do Monte Hakurei
The Power of Banryu: Duel to the Death on Mt. Hakurei
強烈蛮竜 白霊山の死闘
